description.narrative: (i) To help the State of Minas Gerais improve the efficiency and effectiveness of public resource use and allocation for economic and social development; (ii) to support the adoption of innovations in public management by the State; and (iii) to support the State in strengthening its results-based management system of monitoring and evaluation of results.

condition.narrative: Enter into, maintain and comply with an agreement (the Technical Cooperation Agreement) with Funda##o Jo#o Pinheiro.

title.narrative: Average percantage delay of Pro-Acesso paving works concluded in the current year

comment.narrative: Measured in weighted average

baseline.value: 120 of these 12 agreements evaluated by March 31, 2009

comment.narrative: This indicator was added to the ISR in March 2013. Before it had been tracked but not reported through the ISR.

target.value: At least 11 of these agreements evaluated for compliance with 2010 targets by April 30, 2011

comment.narrative: The contracts are currently being evaluated.
This indicator was added to the ISR in March 2013. Before it had been tracked but not reported through the ISR.
The target for 2010 was 13% and the actual 14.95%; the Operation balance for 2011 was 13.12;

title.narrative: Registration in the Vocational Education Program (PEP)

comment.narrative: This indicator was added to the ISR in early 2013, but has been monitored before.
This indicator was achieved in 2009.
This indicator was added to the ISR only in March 2013, but has been tracked before.

title.narrative: Improve poverty monitoring: completion of PAD-MG in 2009.

target.value: Analytical report on poverty in the "Great North" region completed.

comment.narrative: Target achieved and not longer monitored.

title.narrative: Percentage of hospitals of PROHOSP program formally assessed for accreditation by the National Accreditation Organization

comment.narrative: Target met. Since 2011, 7 additional hospitals have been accredited in 2012.

title.narrative: Number of new students enrolled in PEP courses in secondary vocational schools (non-cumulative)

comment.narrative: The target was achieved in 2010 but indicators continues to be monitored

title.narrative: percent of state paved roads network under results-based maintenance and rehabilitation contracts

comment.narrative: Target not achieved and indicator no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Investment expenditure as a share of net current revenue

comment.narrative: target for 2011 was 9.47%

title.narrative: Number of certified teachers in the Curso de Magisterio Indigena

comment.narrative: Target already achieved and indicator no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Average time for the concession of environmental licenses for activities with environmental impact in the state for classes 3 and 4

comment.narrative: Target already achieved but continued to be monitored.

title.narrative: Number of certified job categories and/or re-certification processes

comment.narrative: Target met and no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Time (in days) to start a business at Minas Facil in Belo Horizonte (one-stop shop)

comment.narrative: Target met, but indicator is continued to be tracked. The time to start a business in BH is 6 days and in the rural areas it is 8days.

title.narrative: Successful implementation of results agreements (RAs considered for this indicator: SEF, SEPLAG, SEMAD, SECTES, SEE and SES)

baseline.value: 4 RAs with results over 70 percent satisfactory.

comment.narrative: SETOP and SEDVAN have been added to this indicator.
Target was met, but indicator is continued to be measured. Two new Technological Innovation Centers have been established (NITec –UFVJM e and NIT CETEC)

title.narrative: Proportion of live births from mothers with 7 or more pre-natal consultations
Share of personnel expenditure as a share of net current revenues of the MG government.

target.value: Consistent with PAF (60 percent or under)

comment.narrative: This DLI will not be achieved and the associated funds will be canceled at project closure.

title.narrative: Percentage of students registered in state schools with expected reading level in the 3rd year of elementary school

comment.narrative: Target met. Data for 2012 yet to be published.

title.narrative: Expenditure on strategic projects as a share of total expenditure

comment.narrative: Data available in early 2014

title.narrative: % of municipalities in the state with paved access

comment.narrative: Target achieved but continued to be monitored.

title.narrative: Existence of cost data in hospitals with time series that indicate trends in costs at organizational level (hospital level) and at the departmental level

target.value: Cost system developed and piloted in two hospitals.

comment.narrative: Target achieved and no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Impact evaluation for the Vida Vida Centers

target.value: Methodology for using DATASUS panel data with monitoring indicators for continued impact evaluation process developed and tested

title.narrative: System of management of civil construction contracts developed and implemented, integrated with SIAD and SIAFI.

baseline.value: No system of electronic invoicing, management of civil contracts fragmented.

target.value: System of management of civil construction contracts developed and implemented, integrated with SIAD and SIAFI, and in use

comment.narrative: Target achieved, indicator no longer monitored.

target.value: Targets described in PAF for the 2010 fiscal year

comment.narrative: Target met but continued to be monitored.

title.narrative: Cost per Student Informational System (SICA) implemented and cost data posted on the web

baseline.value: System exists with information updated once a year.

target.value: Regular reports and analysis produced on evolution of costs per student.

comment.narrative: Achieved in previous year and no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Support systems of monitoring and evaluation

target.value: Report discussing the use of the evidence provided by the impact evaluations in the elaboration of the 2012-2015 PPA.

comment.narrative: Target met and no longer monitored.

title.narrative: (i) Total Number of Test Items (cumulative) / (ii) Participation rate total number of schools that apply the test for the 9th gradeclassrooms in five subjects) (cumulative)

comment.narrative: Target already achieved in 2010, but indicator is continued to be measured.

title.narrative: Intensive Monitoring of the Rural Poverty Reduxction Project
Number of families benefited by the Rural Poverty Reduction Program starting in 2010

comment.narrative: Revised data - target already met, but indicator continued to be monitored

title.narrative: Number of eletronic speed control equipments in operation

comment.narrative: Target already met but continued to be monitored.

title.narrative: Secondary schools in the Great North offering computer maintenance courses

baseline.value: Strategic projoects under implementation and ongoing monitoring of output and outcome indicators

target.value: A report outlining the Government's priorities, strategies and performance indicators is prepared

comment.narrative: Target met and no longer monitored.

title.narrative: Implement system of measurement and feedback - standardized student assessments for Portuguese and Mathematics

target.value: PROALFA and PROEB conducted at classes of 3rd, 5th, 9th grade of elementary school and the 3rd grade of high school. Action Planin80% of the schools.

comment.narrative: Dropped with AF.

target.value: Expression of Interest Notices published for 5 additional highways lots

comment.narrative: Target already achieved. This indicator continues to measure other PPPs. Currently there are i) Highway MG-050, Soccer Stadium,Prison Complex and the UAI (Unidade de Atendimento Integrado)
